!Mercenary Red Foot: All right, lets go ahead and open this box Opening a padlock like this one is a piece of cake Here we go! There that was too easy. Now, lets see whats in the box.%% Whats this? Its Spidersilk Rope! Its a very strong and light rope that is made from the spidersilk that is collected from the Tarantula Spiders webs in the Spine Mountain Range. If you take it to a store, Im sure you should be able to get a really good price for it.%% [Quest _333_BlackLionHunt f_more_help|Return]
